backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining submission types, access control, session management, and storage handling for audio/video submissions. Includes admin session validation and helpers for username formatting and text processing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report mapping feature IDs to the frontend files implementing them, including MP3 conversion, upload flow rules, and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files, including recording, validation, routing, admin tools, and submission handling.
frontend/FFMPEG_SETUP.md: Documentation stub describing required dependencies for setting up FFmpeg.wasm in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions including light and dark mode design tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend application loading the root React component and favicon.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview covering features, security, architecture, and admin authentication workflow for the AudioDrop application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application router, including public and admin routes with guards, wrapped in theme and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Downloads an audio blob by fetching bytes, creating a WebM blob, and triggering a download with status feedback.
Streams and plays an audio blob using its direct URL with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Downloads audio or video blobs based on media type, building the correct MIME blob and triggering download.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Triggers a backend submission download using an actor and reports success or errors with toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Streams and plays a video blob using its direct URL with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Shows a confirmation dialog and deletes a submission via mutation, then redirects and reports status.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: UI component providing CSV export for submissions and a placeholder ZIP export action.
Component that checks admin authentication state and either renders children or displays an access‑denied prompt with navigation options.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layouts the app with header, footer, and navigation, handling admin session state and hiding chrome on the success page.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Provides in-browser audio recording with pause, stop, MP3 conversion, and error handling before returning the file.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Implements a simple math CAPTCHA requiring correct input before continuing, with regeneration and error display.
frontend/src/dev/ffmpegSmoke.ts: Development utilities to test FFmpeg.wasm MP3 conversion using a blob or recorded audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Custom hook wrapping MediaRecorder to manage audio recording, timing, errors, and resulting blob data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles and submissions using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts: Provides admin login, logout, and session-check helpers using a backend actor with client-side session storage.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin auth utilities.
frontend/src/lib/adminDownloads.ts: Implements admin-only submission file downloads, handling permission errors and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin session utilities.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Validates audio files by size, extension, and MIME type, and includes formatting helpers for size and duration.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: Placeholder CSRF token utilities storing tokens in sessionStorage and attaching them to headers.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Provides helpers to trigger file downloads from blobs or URLs in the browser.
frontend/src/lib/ffmpeg/convertToMp3.ts: Loads FFmpeg.wasm on demand and converts audio blobs to MP3 format using a singleton FFmpeg instance.
frontend/src/lib/mediaMime.ts: Maps between MIME types and extensions and infers or normalizes MIME types from filenames or backend data.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Provides basic text sanitization, truncation, and HTML escaping utilities.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Formats timestamps, file sizes, durations, and submission IDs for display.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Validates video files by size, MIME type, and extension; primarily deprecated for public uploads.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard listing submissions with search, sorting, error states, and download/export tools.
Admin login form handling credential submission, validation, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin UI for modifying CAPTCHA, rate limits, and upload size settings, currently stored client-side.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Audit log viewer with client‑side filtering; displays placeholder data pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Admin page that loads a submission by ID, displays metadata and media player, and provides download and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: Form page for students to upload or record audio, validate inputs, handle CAPTCHA, and submit via API.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Simple confirmation page showing successful submission message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing MP3 conversion requirements, existing features, and pending requests.
